output:
You must look side to side Of a vanishing star in the sky
She looks deadly apart In this world of art
A Californian ride Would do her good to warm up her soul
She held a clue in her hand But she don't give a damn anymore
Who rest lies in the sand Wonders where the good dreams have gone
Hope of freedom and love Buried with the plants of a better world
She's about to lose her mind She's about to lose her time
She has given up the fight But she'll be fine
Who is love at your side? She knows the magic will fade in a while
No need to question why For she knows it won't forever last
Who is love at your side?
